text: Zacharias Chaliabalias (; 8 March 1946 – 22 July 2020) was a Greek international footballer. He spent his entire career with Iraklis playing as a centre-back from 1964 to 1975. He also played for the national team between 1968 and 1972. Chaliabalias was born in Thessaloniki, Greece. He died in Thessaloniki on 22 July 2020, aged 74.Θρήνος στον Ηρακλή! Πέθανε ο Χαλιαμπάλιας ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Greek footballers
title: Zacharias Chaliabalias
